an2.151-162:4.1: “There are these two kinds of welcome.
an2.151-162:4.3: Welcome in material things and welcome in the teaching.
an2.151-162:4.4: These are the two kinds of welcome.
an2.151-162:4.5: The better of these two kinds of welcome is the welcome in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:6.1: “There are these two kinds of hospitality.
an2.151-162:6.3: Hospitality in material things and hospitality in the teaching.
an2.151-162:6.4: These are the two kinds of hospitality.
an2.151-162:6.5: The better of these two kinds of hospitality is the hospitality in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:8.3: The search for material things and the search for the teaching.
an2.151-162:8.5: The better of these two searches is the search for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:10.3: The search for material things and the search for the teaching.
an2.151-162:10.5: The better of these two searches is the search for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:12.1: “There are these two kinds of seeking.
an2.151-162:12.3: Seeking for material things and seeking for the teaching.
an2.151-162:12.4: These are the two kinds of seeking.
an2.151-162:12.5: The better of these two kinds of seeking is seeking for the teaching.”
an2.151-162:14.1: “There are these two kinds of worship.
an2.151-162:14.3: Worship with material things and worship with the teaching.
an2.151-162:14.4: These are the two kinds of worship.
an2.151-162:14.5: The better of these two kinds of worship is worship with the teaching.”
an2.151-162:16.1: “There are these two ways of serving guests.
an2.151-162:16.3: Serving guests with material things and serving guests with the teaching.
an2.151-162:16.4: These are the two ways of serving guests.
an2.151-162:16.5: The better of these two ways of serving guests is is to serve them with the teaching.”
an2.151-162:18.3: Success in material things and success in the teaching.
an2.151-162:18.5: The better of these two successes is the success in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:20.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of growth.
an2.151-162:20.3: Growth in material things and growth in the teaching.
an2.151-162:20.4: These are the two kinds of growth.
an2.151-162:20.5: The better of these two kinds of growth is growth in the teaching.”
an2.151-162:22.3: The treasure of material things and the treasure of the teaching.
an2.151-162:22.5: The better of these two treasures is the treasure of the teaching.”
an2.151-162:24.1: “There are these two kinds of accumulation.
an2.151-162:24.3: Accumulation of material things and accumulation of the teaching.
an2.151-162:24.4: These are the two kinds of accumulation.
an2.151-162:24.5: The better of these two kinds of accumulation is the accumulation of the teaching.”
an2.151-162:26.1: “There are, mendicants, these two kinds of increase.
an2.151-162:26.3: Increase in material things and increase in the teaching.
an2.151-162:26.4: These are the two kinds of increase.
an2.151-162:26.5: The better of these two kinds of increase is increase of the teaching.”
